cause.description:
Hey there Here is a place that we can find our friends and have a place to chat. This is a place for tolerance not ignorance!
1. We are who we were meant to be!
2. This is a place for tolerance not ignorance!
3. Love one another ..... Say's it in "the book" and "the book" is never wrong!
cause.mission: mix amoung our friends and supporters
cause.name: Proud to be GAY
